cards.title: Discord Markdown Badge
cards.caption: An SVG badge that shows your Discord username and presence. ${mdbUserCount} people use it, so it must be somewhat good. I think.

cards.title: TikTok TTS
cards.caption: A page that allows you to read text in TikTok's Text To Speech voices and download the audio as an mp3.

cards.title: Adobe Fonts dl
cards.caption:
A page that lets you download .otf fonts from any Adobe Fonts Web Project/Typekit URL.
Made this 'cause adobe only allows system-wide installation of fonts on Windows and macOS, but I use Linux.

cards.title: Binbows 98
cards.caption: A Next.js-based recreation of Windows 9X. Currently an early WIP, so expect bugs. Many bugs.
